mapper.update: update userinfo set nickname=#{nickname}, name=#{name}, pw=#{pw}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from userinfo where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update userinfo set cash=#{cash} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into shopBasket (num, id, gdnum) values ((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from shopBasket), #{id}, #{gdnum})
mapper.select: select sb.gdnum, gd.title, gd.writer, gd.regidate gregidate, sb.regidate sregidate, gd.price from gamedetail gd, (select * from shopbasket where id=#{id}) sb where gd.num = sb.gdnum order by sregidate desc
mapper.delete: delete from shopBasket where id=#{id} and gdnum=#{gdnum}

select gdnum from buyList where num=#{num} and id=#{id}
select gdnum, title, b.num from buyList b, gamedetail g where id=#{id} and buydate between (SELECT sysdate - 1 FROM DUAL) and sysdate and b.gdnum=g.num
